attributes.action: Leave office, because he is, in our opinion, either out of his depth, or willfully destroying Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As former Chancellor and now PM, GB must accept full responsibility for horrendous levels of crime and the grossly disproportionate house price / average wage ratio,as well as record fuel, gas, electricity & water prices.  The first two alone will fundamentally change our current and future generations' lives for the worse unless they are sorted out.  He must do the decent thing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
